entry.title: First release
entry.summary: Welcome to the first release of Roadmap to Janna. I hope it will be as beneficial for you as it has been for me, or even more.
entry.content:
Welcome to the first release of Roadmap to Janna. I hope it will be as beneficial for you as it has been for me, or even more.

Iâ€™ll aim to release an update at the beginning of each month or less frequently, depending on changes to the system.

Each update will include three sections:

  • What was added
  • What changed
  • What was removed
